title: Baby Baron
body:
Super fearsome.

Edit:
[More Baby Baron](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7WbXmNrPRw)

[Natalie](https://www.facebook.com/nataliescustomcosplay/) made the onesie, we made the baby.

The design was inspired by this [drawing](https://jessythepika.deviantart.com/art/Kog-Maw-in-Baron-Onesie-573833385)

replies.body: HNNNNNNGGGGGGGGGGGGG SO CUTE!!!!
And this is why we kill Baron on the rift; SOMEBODY keeps feeding it cute babies.

does this one have real vomiting action? 

really cute costume too.

_2 years ago_

Parents disappear into bedroom at midnight.

Child 1: ,,What do you think are they doing there?"
Child 2: ,,I think they're doing baron!"

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IEkcJfkv,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-11-01T00:40:09.801+0000)
>
> _2 years ago_
> 
> Parents disappear into bedroom at midnight.
> 
> Child 1: ,,What do you think are they doing there?"
> Child 2: ,,I think they're doing baron!"

That is umm, pr Baby not how you wanted it to sound but you made it sound very bad as in they are “doing” baron
How else do you explain the Baron Baby?
Just make sure some people dressed as champions dont start attacking him
did you kill him for the buff?
Team wouldn't group.

Oh maaan, i thought someone had drawn or designed a baby baron skin for kog!!

Nice post anyway. :)

They did! -goes back to edit-
But the design came from [this drawing](https://jessythepika.deviantart.com/art/Kog-Maw-in-Baron-Onesie-573833385)
Baby herald next confirmed? CUTEEEE
your baby doesnt have feets ? damn its scary af
_trick2gscremingspillintensifies_
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
We might be related <3 (my Bub looks very similar)
We could be! I have 12 half-siblings and the SO's family is pretty big too.
It rises from the depths of the nothingness...  Even the beasts of the void fear this mighty beast...  Even utter terror does not fully encapsulate the sheer cuteness.  It is.  VOID BABY!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Good job! So cute!
